ovdesc.p: This file is used to store the types of agreements used in Swap contracts.

Each contract must be linked to an agreement type. The field AGREEMENT.TYPE on the Swap contract is validated against the agreement type definitions on this file and enriched with the associated description.

Id defines the type of agreement used in Swap contracts.
Eg. ISDA, BBAIRS, MASTER etc.
1-30 Alpha-numeric characters. (Mandatory input)
Input must be either TYPE for master agreement type or TYPE / DATE // VERSION for full agreement types.
For full agreement types TYPE,DATE and VERSION are mandatory
TYPE can be up to six alphanumeric characters.
DATE must be eight numeric characters in the form YYYYMMDD.
VERSION must be four numeric characters.
